name: Hound
description: Job Search Engine, Search Employer Jobs
overview: Hound is the world leader in the monitoring and reporting of jobs on employer websites, through its active and growing research into all employers throughout the world. Hound is a company owned by Employment Research Institute, one of the world’s largest conglomerates of job search-related companies. Hound serves consumer job seekers, recruiting firms, university career services offices, unemployment offices and outplacement firms, bringing job opening research, employer information, and more to Hound’s clients. Hound has been exceptionally effective at what it does, consistently increasing the number of jobs on its site year after year. Hound locates and classifies jobs on employer websites and provides its highly specialized research to job seekers, recruiters and other job sites throughout North America.
